backend/main.mo: Defines core workout, exercise, recovery, user profile, and error types along with a predefined exercise library for backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure containing no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of all major frontend files including styles, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Logs deployment retry attempts and documents fixes applied to workout filtering and generation logic.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template configuring PWA metadata, icons, splash screens, and loading the React app entry point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and categories for Gym Tracker.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application controller handling authentication flow, lazy‑loaded pages, navigation state, and workout validation.
Modal component for updating user bodyweight with validation, profile mutation, and UI controls for units and input.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a bottom navigation bar with icons and opens the settings modal when selected.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Displays alternative exercises and records selected exercise changes through backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the top app header with branding, settings access, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Implements a custom pull-to-refresh interaction using touch events and an animated indicator.
Fetches and displays muscle recovery data with colored indicators and optional leg subgroup weighting.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: Provides a modal for editing and saving user profile settings including weight, preferences, and theme mode.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows an animated splash screen with app branding during initial load.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Displays the user's workout streak and today's date in a sticky status bar.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: Modal component that generates and displays a QR code and share link for a workout, supporting copy-to-clipboard and native sharing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks and helpers for backend interactions, including error parsing, workout validation, and profile defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Hook providing robust screen wake lock management with automatic reacquisition, error handling, and visibility-state awareness.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based dark theme styling with Telegram-inspired colors, mobile optimizations, safe-area utilities, and font settings.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides utilities to save, load, validate, and clear workout session state in sessionStorage with a 24‑hour expiration.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Converts backend BigInt timestamps from nanoseconds to milliseconds and offers validation, Date conversion, and formatting helpers.
Groups exercises by muscle group and builds ordered workout sections, including structured leg subsections and fallback handling for unexpected groups.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with workout history, recovery data, timestamps formatting, refresh handling, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays past workouts with timestamp formatting, calendar highlighting, and pull‑to‑refresh using workout history data.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a styled login screen enabling authentication through Internet Identity with feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: UI for selecting a workout type and triggering generation via query hooks, then returning the generated workout upstream.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: User profile setup form that validates inputs and saves profile data using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays recovery status and weekly muscle group volume with refresh support using query data.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Validates and previews a generated workout, supports regenerating and changing exercises before starting a session.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Manages an active workout session including sets, timers, logs, exercise changes, and saving session data.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines frontend-only types for exercises, workouts, recovery, and configuration structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind config with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s backend state, known issues, and pending feature/refactor requests for the Motoko workout generator.
